forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 87. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 63. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun casts a gentle warmth over Boston, a soft glow that hints at the balm of summer. At this moment, temperatures flirt with a comfortable warmth, inviting those who yearn for a taste of the outdoors. As the day matures, a mostly sunny sky reveals itself, brightening the cityscape while promising an upcoming evening under a clear vault of stars. With a light breeze weaving through the streets, one can almost hear the rustle of leaves and the distant chatter of neighbors, all caught in the rhythm of an ideal day.

As twilight approaches, the temperature will ease into a pleasant coolness, perfect for an evening stroll or perhaps a quiet gathering with friends. Light layers will serve well: a comfortable t-shirt paired with a light cardigan will keep the chill at bay without sacrificing style. It’s the kind of day that beckons one to partake in the simple pleasures—perhaps a leisurely walk along the Esplanade, where the water’s reflection dances in the soft light, or a visit to a patio café, sipping on something chilled as the sun dips low in the horizon. 

A day like today reminds us to savor these fleeting moments of beauty. The forecast and the atmosphere ripple with a tranquil charm, urging us to leave our worries behind and embrace the warmth of the season.
